Title: Simple Scripting Test
Description: Logs results to a file (see script for details).

Title: MS Exchange (2013 or higher): Enable Certificate
Description: Enable Certificate for common services including: POP,IMAP,SMTP,IIS

Title: MS Remote Desktop Listener: Enable Certificate
Description: Enable Certificate for Remote Desktop Listener

Title: MS Web Management Service (Web Deploy etc): Enable Certificate
Description: Enable Certificate for Web Management Service
